title: [Romper Stomper review : The Movie Show]
brief_description: Despite their shared passion for film, Margaret Pomeranz and David Stratton often disagreed wildly on the films they reviewed on their program, ‘The Movie Show’. A notable case in point is their review of Geoffrey Wright’s film, ‘Romper Stomper’, where they have two very different readings of the theme of racism in Australia.
